column4: hey guys i asked how to i minimize the  terminal server client i dont want to disconnect every time i just want to minimize it and some one here said alt F9 it didnt work i tryed shift F9 and so on can some ones please help me thank you
minimize which terminal server client? graphical or command line?
on my tsc i just mouse over the middle of the top of the screen and it brings up a menu pane that has a minimize button.
